definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to teach by words and example (idiom)
can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: ke3 yi3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

sentences.english: It is rather to be thought of than expressed what was now my condition.
sentences.chinese: 我现在的情形是只可意会，不可言传的。

sentences.english: The phenomenon is described as "acting as an example to others" and "equality of human rights".
sentences.chinese: 他们把这种现象解释为“言传身教”和“人权平等。”

sentences.english: The old workers instruct the young workers not only in words but in deeds.
sentences.chinese: 老工人对青年工人不仅言传而且身教。

sentences.english: For childhood, for history, for many reasons can not explain in words.
sentences.chinese: 为童年，为历史，为许多无法言传的原因。

sentences.english: Beauty is in the terms of human meanings is meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 从人生各种意义来看，美是难以言传的。

sentences.english: Teach them good manners and behavior through your actions as much as your words.
sentences.chinese: 孩子良好的习惯与行为规范，要通过言传身教来养成。

sentences.english: It was a joy hard to explain in words.
sentences.chinese: 那是一种难以言传的喜悦。

sentences.english: Confucius was knowledge and he always taught his students by his words and behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 孔子很博学，而他总是通过言传身教教育他的学生们。

sentences.english: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
sentences.chinese: 友谊的表达方式是只可意会，不可言传的。

sentences.english: The son HAD well profited by the precept and example of the father.
sentences.chinese: 老太爷的言传身教早已使他儿子获益无穷。

sentences.english: There under in my words and deeds toward a better life?
sentences.chinese: 有没有在我的言传身教下走向美好的生活呢？

sentences.english: We influence future generations by living for Christ today.
sentences.chinese: 今日竭诚为主活，言传身教下一代。

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: to teach by words and example (idiom)
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

definition: (conventional letter ending) words cannot fully express what is in my heart (idiom)
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4
